definition: to revamp/a face-lift/to retread (a tire)/to refurbish (old clothes)/newly emerging
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Emilia, herself, sewed and reversed all their dresses.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉亞自己縫衣服，並把所有舊衣服都翻新。

sentences.english: I was with Tomas, a friend who'd lived with us for a while when he had been renovating his own house.
sentences.chinese: 有個朋友叫托馬斯，在他翻新房子時暫時住在我們這。

sentences.english: The other nine are being revamped.
sentences.chinese: 另外九門課也將得到翻新。

sentences.english: The railway is undergoing signal improvement and train refurbishment works.
sentences.chinese: 東鐵正進行改善訊號系統和列車翻新工程。

sentences.english: It cost much to renovate old college buildings at the University of CHANGJIANG.
sentences.chinese: 翻新長江大學的舊校舍花費很大。

sentences.english: What percentage of energy used during the Olympics will come from renewable sources?
sentences.chinese: 翻新使用的場館在奧運的全部場館中佔多大比例？

sentences.english: Therefore, if you want to renovate your old home then don?
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果你想你的舊家翻新，然後穿上？

sentences.english: The company also built die, die to undertake renovation of the old business.
sentences.chinese: 華建模具公司同時承接模具以舊翻新業務。

sentences.english: Guidance on the classification and design of plastics piping systems used for renovation.
sentences.chinese: 翻新用塑料管道系統的分類和設計指南。

sentences.english: I bought one of these refurbished 4250's about 2 months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我買了這些翻新的4250人的大約2個月前。

sentences.english: Swift renovation screen, the wind around the old sticks of cuckoo.
sentences.chinese: 雨燕翻新幕，風鵑繞舊枝。

sentences.english: It provides medical treatment and rehabilitation services to patients through hospitals, specialist clinics and outreaching services.
sentences.chinese: 專科診所正在重建或進行大型翻新工程。

sentences.english: Drives must be new or remanufactured to Dixie Specifications.
sentences.chinese: 驅動器必須是新的，或者以迪克斯的標準翻新的。

sentences.english: A metal worker was assigned to dismantle an old metal gate and its frame on a renovation site.
sentences.chinese: 工人在翻新工地中拆卸舊金屬鐵閘及其閘架。

sentences.english: Briefly introduces new process of producing retread tire and general equipment and technical target.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹了輪胎翻新工藝，及其通用設備和技術指標。

sentences.english: It is particularly suited to retrofitting efforts.
sentences.chinese: 它特別適用於翻新工作。

definition: to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
to replace with sth new/to upgrade
to look completely new (idiom); brand new/changed beyond recognition
